cause.description:
For too long the Sudanese, or Sudan people have been living the life of luxury while the worlds real problems have been over looked. For instance, Lindsay Lohan's drug problem. Stop the partying in Sudan.
1. Sudan must share their wealth.
2. They must set strict Quoata's on parties.
3. Stop the goddamn partying in Sudan.
cause.mission: Stop Those Hedonists Over in Sudan.
cause.name: Stop The Partying in Sudan
